name: A quick patch
description:
A short platformer type game made for the xkcd game jam. Based on the art style of the original comic. 

I recommend playing the game before reading, but the particular inspiration for this comes from

Xkcd https://xkcd.com/705/

I made it using unity and a lot of it was while I was offstage in a Shakespeare play. It was very tricky to get it finished.
